# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="99361-102">Karodziņu un atgādinājumu pievienošana programmā Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="99361-103">Lai iestatītu vai rediģētu notikuma atgādinājumu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-104">Dodieties uz [Kalendārs](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-105">Atlasiet notikumu, par kuru vēlaties saņemt atgādinājumu, un pēc tam atlasiet bultiņas augšējā labajā stūrī</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="99361-106">lai to izvērstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-107">Blakus **atgādināt man**izvēlieties atgādinājuma laiku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="99361-108">Outlook.com automātiski saglabā jūsu veiktās izmaiņas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="99361-109">Lai atgādinātu sev par sekojumu ziņojumā, varat pievienot sekojuma karodziņu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-110">Došanās uz [pastu](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-111">Ziņojumu sarakstā norādiet uz ziņojumu, lai redzētu karodziņa opciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="99361-112">Atlasiet karodziņa ikonu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="99361-113">lai atzīmētu ziņojumu ar karodziņu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="99361-114">Lai redzētu visus ar karodziņu atzīmētos ziņojumus, atlasiet atzīmi lapas kreisajā apakšējā stūrī, lai dotos uz uzdevumi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="99361-115">Lai iegūtu papildinformāciju, lasiet rakstu [Karodziņa pievienošana vai piespraušana programmā Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="99361-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
